docs.text: EVA Carriages ¶ Platform ¶ EVA is a platform for MGN rail based 3D Printer carriages. Mainstream support fouses on Rat Rig 3D printers but it's customizable enough to support different systems. Rather lenghty video descriptions can be found on the YouTube playlist . Download ¶ This manual is full of links to specific parts, but there is no need to download those one by one the full repository can be downloaded as a ZIP file . Examples ¶ For Rat Rig V-core Pro the Easy Mod is required to change the X and Y rail orientation. Contribution ¶ Issues, problems, feature requests, requests for compatibility with different printers can be requested in the project's issue tracker . Attributions ¶ One does not need a keen eye to see that this design it's based on many different designs that are out in the wild - although all the parts here are made from scratch - their authors deserve credit (their work provided inspiration): Rat Rig for making the V-core which is the perfect sanbox for building and modding a 3D Printer pekcitron for the Prusa Bear Upgrade BLV and his amazing BLV mgn cube
docs.title: EVA Carriages

docs.text: EVA is a platform for MGN rail based 3D Printer carriages. Mainstream support fouses on Rat Rig 3D printers but it's customizable enough to support different systems. Rather lenghty video descriptions can be found on the YouTube playlist .

docs.title: Attributions

docs.text: Bed probes ¶ EVA platform follows a simple standard for different bed probe mounts. Each carriage has 2 vertically alligned M3 screw holes, 8mm apart. All probe mounts follow this standard but there are special veriants of probes where a probe mount had to be modified to fit a carriage (i.e. BL-Touch on the Aero Assembly). Probe Type File Link 8mm inductive probe lj8_probe_right.stl GitHub 8mm inductive probe lj8_probe_left.stl GitHub 8mm inductive probe lj8_probe_center.stl GitHub 12mm inductive probe lj12_probe_right.stl GitHub 12mm inductive probe lj12_probe_left.stl GitHub BL-Touch bl_touch.stl GitHub BL-Touch bl_touch_thick.stl GitHub
docs.title: Bed probes

docs.title: Bed probes

docs.text: Getting started ¶ EVA is very modular - this means that the final carriage assembly is achieved by picking a proper set of sub assemblies. Sub assemblies are built out of different printed, hardware and electronic parts. Bellow is a listing of available presets (assemblies) can be found which the list of sub assemblies and the parts required to build a carriage. Note The predefined assembies are not the only possible options, i.e. check the cartesian back parts. EVA the carriage platform V6 Bowden - full carriage assembly v6 - sub assembly top_cable - sub assembly core_xy_back - sub assembly bottom_8mm - sub assembly face_v6 - sub assembly V6 Titan - full carriage assembly v6 - sub assembly top_titan - sub assembly core_xy_back - sub assembly bottom_8mm - sub assembly face_titan - sub assembly Titan Aero - full carriage assembly v6 - sub assembly top_cable - sub assembly core_xy_back - sub assembly bottom_14mm - sub assembly face_aero - sub assembly V6 BMG - full carriage assembly v6 - sub assembly top_bmg - sub assembly core_xy_back - sub assembly bottom_8mm - sub assembly face_v6 - sub assembly Hemera - full carriage assembly v6 - sub assembly top_cable - sub assembly core_xy_back - sub assembly bottom_8mm_angled - sub assembly face_hemera - sub assembly Hemera Alternative - full carriage assembly v6 - sub assembly top_cable - sub assembly core_xy_back - sub assembly bottom_8mm_angled - sub assembly face_hemera_alt - sub assembly
docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: EVA is very modular - this means that the final carriage assembly is achieved by picking a proper set of sub assemblies. Sub assemblies are built out of different printed, hardware and electronic parts. Bellow is a listing of available presets (assemblies) can be found which the list of sub assemblies and the parts required to build a carriage. Note The predefined assembies are not the only possible options, i.e. check the cartesian back parts. docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: The printed parts are presented in the videos contained in this playlist . The parts were made to be printed easily and without any supports but need to be oriented individually. There are two print settings to consider: 0.3 layer height, 4x 0.4mm perimeters, 20% infill - PETG 0.1 layer height, 4x 0.4mm perimeters, 20% infill - PETG or something more heat resistant for the layer fan ducts.
